Name: Kemono Mahjong
About the game: No mere tile-matching solitaire game, this is a full implementation of Japanese Mahjong. A fun, strategic variant of the classic Chinese 4-player game! Features: * Real (4-player) mahjong! (you vs. 3 CPU opponents - or play online with friends!) * Japanese/Riichi style following European Mahjong Association (EMA) rules * Beautiful, easy-to-read tiles (with traditional and simplified tile sets) * Colourful cast of characters * Beautiful music * Multiple languages! (English, Spanish, French, Dutch, German, Polish, Russian, Thai, Chinese Simplified, Korean, Japanese) * Tutorials and in-game help, ideal for new players!
